short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find the optimal price for your used goods

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find the optimal price for your used goods in one click.

This extension is able to calculate the precise price of your goods based on:

1. Product name
2. Product condition: new, light visual damage...
3. Product purchase date
4. Product purchase price
5. Purchase region

You can use the predicted price to sell your used goods profitably without the need to do market research by yourself. Save hours of your time and enjoy the unprecedented quality of our algorithms to sell your used goods at ease.

The extension only predicts the potential price to sell. It does not include customer search service. The predicted price is recommended but it is up to you to change it to whatever direction that feels more appropriate to you.
